Onix Plugin Documentation
Table of Contents

Class SvgDocument

Namespace
OnixRuntime.Api.Utils
Assembly
OnixRuntime.dll

Represents an SVG document and provides methods for rendering, styling, and querying its geometry.

public class SvgDocument : MightOwnMemoryAddressContainer, IDisposable

Constructors

SvgDocument(string)

Initializes a new instance of the SvgDocument class from SVG content. When the SVG cannot be parsed, InvalidDataException is thrown your way.

public SvgDocument(string svgContent)

Parameters

svgContent string

The SVG content as a string.

Exceptions

InvalidDataException

When the SVG cannot be parsed.

Properties

Size

The size of the SVG document, which is it's width= and height= fields.

public Vec2 Size { get; }

Property Value

Vec2

Methods

ApplyStyleSheet(string)

Applies a CSS stylesheet to the SVG document.

public void ApplyStyleSheet(string cssContent)

Parameters

cssContent string

The CSS stylesheet content as a string.

GetArea()

Gets the bounding area of the SVG document's content.

public Rect GetArea()

Returns

Rect

A Rect representing the area of the SVG.

GetArea(Vec2, Vec2)

Gets the transformed bounding area of the SVG document's content using the specified scale and position.

public Rect GetArea(Vec2 scale, Vec2 position)

Parameters

scale Vec2

The scale to apply.

position Vec2

The position to apply after scaling.

Returns

Rect

A Rect representing the transformed area.

GetArea(Vec2, Vec2, Vec2)

Gets the transformed bounding area of the SVG document using the specified scale, position, and pre-scale position.

public Rect GetArea(Vec2 scale, Vec2 position, Vec2 preScalePosition)

Parameters

scale Vec2

The scale to apply.

position Vec2

The position to apply after scaling.

preScalePosition Vec2

The position to apply before scaling.

Returns

Rect

A Rect representing the transformed area.

Render(int, int, Vec2)

Renders the SVG document to a new image with the specified width, height, scale, and position.

public RawImageData Render(int width, int height, Vec2 scale)

Parameters

width int

The width of the output image.

height int

The height of the output image.

scale Vec2

The scale to apply.

Returns

RawImageData

A RawImageData containing the rendered SVG.

Render(int, int, Vec2, Vec2, Vec2)

Renders the SVG document to a new image with the specified width, height, scale, position, and pre-scale position.

public RawImageData Render(int width, int height, Vec2 scale, Vec2 position, Vec2 preScalePosition)

RawImageData

Render(int, int, bool)

Renders the SVG document to a new image with the specified width and height, using default scale and position.

public RawImageData Render(int width, int height, bool scaleToFit = true)

Parameters

width int

The width of the output image.

height int

The height of the output image.

scaleToFit bool

If true, it will scale the SVG to the image.

Returns

RawImageData

A RawImageData containing the rendered SVG.

RenderTo(RawImageData, Vec2)

Renders the SVG document to the specified image using the given scale and position.

public void RenderTo(RawImageData image, Vec2 scale)

image RawImageData

The target RawImageData to render into.

scale Vec2

The scale to apply.
